name: F1 Racer (Inconsistent Pixels)
description:
Carlos Sainz is out for the whole year with a new, mysterious illness that seems to have only infected him! You are Ferrari's super sub and they have high hopes for you to help bring them back to glory. Help bring them back to dominance and write your name in the history books.

Race through the track layouts before time expires. Don't hit the kerbs either or your engine will suffer catastrophic failure! See if you have what it takes to become a legend in the racing world.

Instructions:   Click and the car will be attracted to where your mouse is being held on.
